kickstart.controller

Class CheckReservationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • kickstart.controller.CheckReservationController

  • @SpringApplicationConfiguration(classes=Application.class)
 @Controller
public class CheckReservationController
extends java.lang.Object
    CartController: connection between the html and java part of the cart
    Since:
    08.11.15.
    Author:
    Beatrice

      • CheckReservationController

        @Autowired
public CheckReservationController(DBMovie dbMovie,
                                              DBComment dbComment,
                                              DBSeat dbSeat,
                                              CProgram cProgram,
                                              org.salespointframework.time.BusinessTime businessTime,
                                              CartRepo cartrepo,
                                              TicketCatalog ticketCatalog,
                                              DBDate dbDate,
                                              DBEvent dbEvent)
        Constructor of the Class, creates a controller which checks for reservations
        Parameters:
        businessTime - BusinessTime : Provided by SalesPoint, its the Time
        cartrepo - CartRepo : Provided by SalesPoint, database
        ticketCatalog - TicketCatalog : Ticket catalog, contains all the tickets
        dbComment - DBComment comment database
        dbSeat - DBSeat seat database
        cProgram - CProgram the program
        dbDate - DBDate CDateStorage database
        dbMovie - DBMovie movie database
        dbEvent - DBEvent event database

    • Method Detail

      • ticketmain

        @RequestMapping(value="checkreservation",
                method=GET)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\', \'ROLE_EMPLOYEE\')")
public java.lang.String ticketmain()
        Displays the main page of ticket and reservation management. Currently iterates through the CCart repository in an attempt to display all currently used objects for testing purposes.
        Returns:
        checkreservation.html

      • check

        @RequestMapping(value="checkreservation",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\', \'ROLE_EMPLOYEE\')")
public java.lang.String check(@RequestParam(value="resCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                                 java.lang.String resCode,
                                                                                                                                                                                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                                                                 org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Checks if an entered transaction ID exists in the database and returns all relevant information including the tickets belonging to the transaction. Tickets have to be found separately as they cannot be saved as attribute of CCart due to persistence functionality.
        Parameters:
        resCode - String : value read from user input of the transaction ID
        model - Model : Provided by Spring
        redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes : Provided by Spring
        Returns:
        ticketview.html when successful, otherwise notfound.html

      • checkpurchase

        @RequestMapping(value="checkpurchase",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\', \'ROLE_EMPLOYEE\')")
public java.lang.String checkpurchase(@RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                                                                      org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Check the database for all transactions belonging to an entered buyer's name
        Parameters:
        name - String : first name and last name
        model - Model : provided by SalesPoint
        redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes : Provided by Spring
        Returns:
        cartview.html

public java.lang.String event(@PathVariable(value="Ident")
                                                                            java.lang.Long Ident,
                                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Method called when looking up a specific cart, not necessarily a reservation

        model - Model : Provided by Spring

      • cancelOne

        @RequestMapping(value="cancelOne",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\', \'ROLE_EMPLOYEE\')")
public java.lang.String cancelOne(@RequestParam(value="resCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long resCode,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ident")
                                                                                                                                                                                              CCinemaTicket ticket,
                                                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="eventID")
                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long eventID,
                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Method called when canceling a single ticket.
        Parameters:
        resCode - transaction-ID given by ticketview.html, currently not used
        ticket - ticket object given via ProductIdentifier by ticketview.html
        eventID - ID of event of canceled ticket, allows going directly to event to issue a new ticket
        redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes Provided by Spring
        model - Model : Provided by SalesPoint
        Returns:
        deleted.html placeholder

      • cancelAll

        @RequestMapping(value="cancelAll",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\', \'ROLE_EMPLOYEE\')")
public java.lang.String cancelAll(@RequestParam(value="resCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.Long cartID,
                                                                                                                                                                                              org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Method called when canceling an entire order. Reservation ID is freed and Seats are made AVAILABLE. The original cart and all its tickets are recreated as canceled objects. Alternatively they could be deleted.
        Parameters:
        cartID - cart-ID given by ticketview.html
        redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes provided by Spring
        Returns:
        ticketview of new cart

      • pay

        @RequestMapping(value="pay",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_BOSS\',\'ROLE_AUTHORIZED\', \'ROLE_EMPLOYEE\')")
public java.lang.String pay(@RequestParam(value="resCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String cartID,
                                                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Method called when paying for a reservation at the cash desk. Seats get marked as PAID. The cart type is marked as RESERVATIONPAID to for statistical purposes, retaining both its original reservation status and its completed payment.
        Parameters:
        cartID - String : resCode transaction-ID given by ticketview.html
        model - Model : Provided by SalesPoint
        Returns:
        buy.html displaying the proper tickets for print

      • print

        @RequestMapping(value="print",

public java.lang.String print(@RequestParam(value="resCode")
                                                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String cartID,
                                                                                                                                                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Method called when printing online paid tickets.
        Parameters:
        cartID - String : transaction-ID given by ticketview.html
        model - Model : Provided by SalesPoint
        Returns:
        buy.html displaying the proper tickets for print

      • rate

        @RequestMapping(value="rate.html",
                method=POST)
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_CUSTOMER\')")
public java.lang.String rate(@ModelAttribute(value="form")
                                                                                                                                                      CommentForm form,
                                                                                                                                                      org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                      java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount,
                                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="movie")
                                                                                                                                                      CMovie movie)
        Method taking the user's input and saving the to a Comment object
        Parameters:
        form - CommentForm handling the inputs of rating and text
        result - BindingResult handling form errors
        model - Model provided by Spring
        userAccount - Optional <UserAccount> active userAccount
        movie - CMovie
        Returns:
        redirect:/rate.html
